text: Ia oragh. Kɨ akar mogomer mamɨn gun ia mɨkɨmasa. En tarazi oveghan kogham. Me ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨma, sɨghar abuananam arangtɨ dughiar kamra God me damightɨ men inivafɨziba igharagh otogham. Bizir kam damazim komokoi moghɨn bar zuamɨram otogham. Sɨgham arangamin dughiamɨn, ariaghireziba ua dɨkavighɨva uam ikuvan kogham. God bar moghɨra e damightɨ e inivafɨzir igharagha garibar otivam.
